mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrLike Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_LIKE_SN , MBR_NO , LIKE_DATE , LIKE_TP_CD , GOD_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_LIKE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_LIKE_SN = #{mbrLikeSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteMbrLike Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM MBR_LIKE WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_LIKE_SN = #{mbrLikeSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
